trans-unit.id: Start guided session
Start session

trans-unit.source: Ombrace
trans-unit.note: Bundle name

trans-unit.source: Questa app utilizza la fotocamera per il tracciamento delle mani.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Utilizzato per il riconoscimento delle mani con Vision
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Face ID Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Allows Siri to start a session in the app.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Siri Usage Description

trans-unit.id: 4 MIN
trans-unit.source: 4 MIN

trans-unit.id: A self-guided and personal space where you can select exercises, reflections, and practices that best support your journey toward self-acceptance. You're free to end the session anytime you need and repeat it whenever you want.
trans-unit.source: A self-guided and personal space where you can select exercises, reflections, and practices that best support your journey toward self-acceptance. You're free to end the session anytime you need and repeat it whenever you want.
trans-unit.target: Un espacio personal y autoguiado donde puedes elegir los ejercicios, reflexiones y prácticas que mejor acompañen tu camino hacia la autoaceptación. Eres libre de terminar la sesión cuando lo necesites y repetirla siempre que lo desees.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains the user how to start the session

trans-unit.id: A space designed to support individuals who are navigating body dysmorphia with self-awareness and a desire for change.
trans-unit.source: A space designed to support individuals who are navigating body dysmorphia with self-awareness and a desire for change.
trans-unit.target: Un espacio diseñado para acompañar a aquellos que están atravesando dificultades relacionadas con la dismorfia corporal, con conciencia y deseo de cambio.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.source: About

trans-unit.id: Allow yourself to enjoy this space of calm, knowing that you can always return to it whenever you need.
trans-unit.source: Allow yourself to enjoy this space of calm, knowing that you can always return to it whenever you need.

trans-unit.id: Are you sure you want to leave?
trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to leave?

trans-unit.id: Bring your attention to the heartbeat, letting your breath guide you.
trans-unit.source: Bring your attention to the heartbeat, letting your breath guide you.

trans-unit.id: Calmly, move both hands toward your elbows.
trans-unit.source: Calmly, move both hands toward your elbows.
Complete
trans-unit.note: A button that allows the user to go back to the home screen after completing the session, the button give the idea of had completed it.

trans-unit.id:
Connect with your body and embrace self-kindness. Through guided exercises and mindfulness, you'll build a healthier, more balanced relationship with yourself—at your own pace, without pressure.
You’re in the right place. Let’s begin.
trans-unit.source:
Connect with your body and embrace self-kindness. Through guided exercises and mindfulness, you'll build a healthier, more balanced relationship with yourself—at your own pace, without pressure.
You’re in the right place. Let’s begin.
trans-unit.target:
Conecta con tu cuerpo y abraza la amabilidad hacia ti mismo. A través de ejercicios guiados y atención plena, construirás una relación más saludable y equilibrada contigo mismo—a tu propio ritmo, sin presión.
Estás en el lugar correcto. Comencemos.
trans-unit.note: The text of the onboarding

trans-unit.source: Continue
trans-unit.note: A button to continue to the next screen of the onboarding Button text to continue the onboarding process after the user has inserted their name

trans-unit.source: Done

trans-unit.id: Enter your name
trans-unit.source: Enter your name

trans-unit.id: Gently bring your attention to the part of you that feels good right now, even if it’s just a small area of comfort.
trans-unit.source: Gently bring your attention to the part of you that feels good right now, even if it’s just a small area of comfort.

trans-unit.id: Give yourself a little squeeze, as if you’re offering yourself a gentle hug with love.
trans-unit.source: Give yourself a little squeeze, as if you’re offering yourself a gentle hug with love.

trans-unit.id: Give yourself the time to listen to what your body is communicating today.
trans-unit.source: Give yourself the time to listen to what your body is communicating today.

trans-unit.id: Guided Session
trans-unit.source: Guided Session
trans-unit.note: Title that welcome the user after selecting Guided Session mode in the menu

trans-unit.id: HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE CALLED?
trans-unit.source: HOW WOULD YOU LIKE TO BE CALLED?

trans-unit.id: Hello, %@
trans-unit.source: Hello, %@
trans-unit.note: Title of the app, it give a greeting to the the user as Hello, UserName

trans-unit.id: How does this sensation feel? Stay for a moment and experience it.
trans-unit.source: How does this sensation feel? Stay for a moment and experience it.

trans-unit.id: How would you like to be called?
trans-unit.source: How would you like to be called?
trans-unit.note: The title of the view where the user can insert their name inside a text field

trans-unit.id: I now invite you to try on your own, exploring the movement and feeling what helps you feel better.
trans-unit.source: I now invite you to try on your own, exploring the movement and feeling what helps you feel better.

trans-unit.id: If it feels right, try gently shifting your attention to another part of your body, perhaps one you haven’t considered yet.
trans-unit.source: If it feels right, try gently shifting your attention to another part of your body, perhaps one you haven’t considered yet.

trans-unit.id: If it feels right, you can accompany this sensation with a light touch, as if giving yourself a gentle hug.
trans-unit.source: If it feels right, you can accompany this sensation with a light touch, as if giving yourself a gentle hug.

trans-unit.id: If you’d like, try bringing your hand to that area with kindness, without judging the sensation.
trans-unit.source: If you’d like, try bringing your hand to that area with kindness, without judging the sensation.

trans-unit.id: If you’d like, you can close your eyes to focus more on the sensations your body is experiencing.
trans-unit.source: If you’d like, you can close your eyes to focus more on the sensations your body is experiencing.

trans-unit.id: If you’d like, you can gently move your thumbs, exploring the sensation of contact.
trans-unit.source: If you’d like, you can gently move your thumbs, exploring the sensation of contact.

trans-unit.id: Imagine offering that area the same warmth and care you would give to someone you love.
trans-unit.source: Imagine offering that area the same warmth and care you would give to someone you love.

trans-unit.id: Immersive Session
trans-unit.source: Immersive Session

trans-unit.id: Insert Later
trans-unit.source: Insert Later
trans-unit.note: Button text that is below a continue button, allowing the user to continue the onboarding process without entering a name

trans-unit.id: Insert name
trans-unit.source: Insert name

trans-unit.id: Inspired by research on self-compassion and supportive touch, our approach encourages gentle, non-judgmental engagement with your body, helping you shift towards a more balanced and appreciative self-perception.
trans-unit.source: Inspired by research on self-compassion and supportive touch, our approach encourages gentle, non-judgmental engagement with your body, helping you shift towards a more balanced and appreciative self-perception.
trans-unit.target: Inspirado en la autocompasión y los gestos reconfortantes, nuestro enfoque te invita a conectar con tu cuerpo de manera suave y sin juicios, ayudándote a cultivar una relación más amable y equilibrada contigo mismo.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.id: It's okay to take a break. You can always come back whenever you're ready.
trans-unit.source: It's okay to take a break. You can always come back whenever you're ready.
trans-unit.target: Está bien hacer una pausa. Puedes regresar cuando te sientas listo.

trans-unit.id: Leave Session
trans-unit.source: Leave Session

trans-unit.id: Let the air gently flow in and expand where it is needed.
trans-unit.source: Let the air gently flow in and expand where it is needed.

trans-unit.id: Let the glowing dots guide your hands with mindfulness and intention.
trans-unit.source: Let the glowing dots guide your hands with mindfulness and intention.
trans-unit.target: Deja que los puntos guíen tus manos con atención y propósito.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains the user how to start the session

trans-unit.id: Let the warmth of your hand bring support and security, like an act of care towards yourself.
trans-unit.source: Let the warmth of your hand bring support and security, like an act of care towards yourself.

trans-unit.id: Let’s begin together, taking a moment to listen. Make sure your body feels comfortable and ready to follow the movement.
trans-unit.source: Let’s begin together, taking a moment to listen. Make sure your body feels comfortable and ready to follow the movement.

trans-unit.id: Listen to what your body is telling you, trusting its wisdom.
trans-unit.source: Listen to what your body is telling you, trusting its wisdom.

trans-unit.id: Make soft movements, as if you’re gently caressing yourself with tenderness.
trans-unit.source: Make soft movements, as if you’re gently caressing yourself with tenderness.
Meditation
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for meditation sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.source: Melody
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for melody sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.id: Move your right hand and place it gently on your left shoulder, so that both shoulders are supported by your hands.
trans-unit.source: Move your right hand and place it gently on your left shoulder, so that both shoulders are supported by your hands.
None
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings, no sound selected, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.source: Notification

trans-unit.id: Notification Settings
trans-unit.source: Notification Settings

trans-unit.id: Notification Time
trans-unit.source: Notification Time

trans-unit.id: Now slowly move your hands down to your biceps, letting your right and left hands slide down your arms, at your own pace.
trans-unit.source: Now slowly move your hands down to your biceps, letting your right and left hands slide down your arms, at your own pace.

trans-unit.id: Now, move your left hand over your heart and your right hand over your stomach, as if appreciating these two important spaces of your body.
trans-unit.source: Now, move your left hand over your heart and your right hand over your stomach, as if appreciating these two important spaces of your body.

trans-unit.id: Now, slowly move both hands down your arms, bringing them together as if you want to unite the hearts of your hands.
trans-unit.source: Now, slowly move both hands down your arms, bringing them together as if you want to unite the hearts of your hands.

trans-unit.id: Now, slowly move your left hand to your right shoulder, as if you want to cradle yourself gently with the touch.
trans-unit.source: Now, slowly move your left hand to your right shoulder, as if you want to cradle yourself gently with the touch.

trans-unit.id: Now, without forcing anything, notice if there is a part that feels tense, tired, or heavy.
trans-unit.source: Now, without forcing anything, notice if there is a part that feels tense, tired, or heavy.

trans-unit.id: Opens the guided session with animations and sounds.
trans-unit.source: Opens the guided session with animations and sounds.

trans-unit.id: Opens the interactive session.
trans-unit.source: Opens the interactive session.

trans-unit.id: Our mission is to help you cultivate a healthier connection with your body through self-compassion, body-focused exercises, and mindful practices.
trans-unit.source: Our mission is to help you cultivate a healthier connection with your body through self-compassion, body-focused exercises, and mindful practices.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra intención es ayudarte a reconectar con tu cuerpo desde la autocompasión, con ejercicios corporales y prácticas de atención.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.source: Piano
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for piano sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.source: Relaxing
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for relaxing sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.id: Select Time
trans-unit.source: Select Time
Settings
Sound

trans-unit.id: Sound Settings
trans-unit.source: Sound Settings

trans-unit.id: Sound Type
trans-unit.source: Sound Type
Start
trans-unit.note: Button to start the session.

trans-unit.id: Start Guided Session
trans-unit.source: Start Guided Session

trans-unit.id: Start Session
trans-unit.source: Start Session

trans-unit.id: Start Your Session
trans-unit.source: Start Your Session

trans-unit.id: Start by gently bringing your left hand to your right cheek, as if you want to softly caress your face with your palm.
trans-unit.source: Start by gently bringing your left hand to your right cheek, as if you want to softly caress your face with your palm.

trans-unit.id: Stay in this feeling of well-being for a moment, allowing it to expand like a gentle light within you.
trans-unit.source: Stay in this feeling of well-being for a moment, allowing it to expand like a gentle light within you.

trans-unit.id: Stay with the sensation of contact with your hand, without rushing. Simply notice how it makes you feel.
trans-unit.source: Stay with the sensation of contact with your hand, without rushing. Simply notice how it makes you feel.

trans-unit.id: Take a deep breath and begin when you're ready.
trans-unit.source: Take a deep breath and begin when you're ready.
trans-unit.target: Respira profundo… y comienza cuando te sientas listo.
trans-unit.note: Text that explains the user how to start the session

trans-unit.id: Take a moment to feel the connection with your body and your breath.
trans-unit.source: Take a moment to feel the connection with your body and your breath.

trans-unit.id: Take a moment to feel the difference between before and now, without expectations.
trans-unit.source: Take a moment to feel the difference between before and now, without expectations.

trans-unit.id: Take a moment to feel your two hands moving together, as if they are gentle hands offering warmth and care.
trans-unit.source: Take a moment to feel your two hands moving together, as if they are gentle hands offering warmth and care.

trans-unit.id: Thank your body for welcoming this experience, exactly as it could today.
trans-unit.source: Thank your body for welcoming this experience, exactly as it could today.

trans-unit.id: There is nothing to change or fix right away—simply stay present with your touch and your breath.
trans-unit.source: There is nothing to change or fix right away—simply stay present with your touch and your breath.

trans-unit.id: This journey is personal, and progress looks different for everyone. Whether you're taking your first step or deepening your practice, Ombrace is here to guide you in fostering a more positive and compassionate relationship with yourself.
trans-unit.source: This journey is personal, and progress looks different for everyone. Whether you're taking your first step or deepening your practice, Ombrace is here to guide you in fostering a more positive and compassionate relationship with yourself.
trans-unit.target: Este camino es personal, y el avance es distinto para cada persona. Ya sea que estés dando tu primer paso o profundizando tu práctica, Ombrace está aquí para acompañarte a construir una relación más amable y positiva contigo mismo.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.id: This position is very practical, and you can use it whenever you want, anywhere, to feel supported.
trans-unit.source: This position is very practical, and you can use it whenever you want, anywhere, to feel supported.

trans-unit.id: Try to follow my gestures, but remember you can go at your own pace. There’s no rush.
trans-unit.source: Try to follow my gestures, but remember you can go at your own pace. There’s no rush.

trans-unit.id: Use the position that makes you feel calmer and more serene, letting go of everything else.
trans-unit.source: Use the position that makes you feel calmer and more serene, letting go of everything else.
User
trans-unit.note: Default username variable if the user dont set one, it is used on the greeting Hello, User

trans-unit.id: Welcome to Ombrace!
trans-unit.source: Welcome to Ombrace!
trans-unit.note: Ombrace is the name of the app, is a welcoming title The title of the Onboarding, Ombrace is the name of the App

trans-unit.id: Well done!
trans-unit.source: Well done!
trans-unit.note: I title that explains to the user that has completed the session

trans-unit.id: What do you feel when you support yourself gently, just like a kind friend would?
trans-unit.source: What do you feel when you support yourself gently, just like a kind friend would?

trans-unit.id: What happens in your body and mind when you offer yourself a gentle touch, just like you would for a friend?
trans-unit.source: What happens in your body and mind when you offer yourself a gentle touch, just like you would for a friend?

trans-unit.id: When you’re ready, slowly let go of the contact and return your awareness to the space around you.
trans-unit.source: When you’re ready, slowly let go of the contact and return your awareness to the space around you.

trans-unit.id: Wherever this experience takes you, you are safe. You are welcomed exactly as you are.
trans-unit.source: Wherever this experience takes you, you are safe. You are welcomed exactly as you are.

trans-unit.id: While we are not medical professionals, our methods are rooted in scientific studies that emphasize kindness, acceptance, and connection as tools for well-being.
trans-unit.source: While we are not medical professionals, our methods are rooted in scientific studies that emphasize kindness, acceptance, and connection as tools for well-being.
trans-unit.target: Aunque no somos profesionales de la salud, nuestros métodos se basan en estudios científicos que destacan la amabilidad, la aceptación y la conexión como herramientas para el bienestar.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.source: Yoga
trans-unit.note: Button option in sound settings for yoga sound, visible in the sound picker

trans-unit.id: You are worthy of kindness—especially from yourself.
trans-unit.source: You are worthy of kindness—especially from yourself.
trans-unit.target: Mereces recibir amabilidad… sobre todo de ti mismo.
trans-unit.note: Information about the app

trans-unit.id: You completed the session! You should be proud of what you have accomplished today.
trans-unit.source: You completed the session! You should be proud of what you have accomplished today.
trans-unit.target: ¡Has completado la sesión! Siéntete orgulloso de lo que has hecho hoy.
trans-unit.note: A text that explains to the user that has completed the session

trans-unit.id: Your Session
trans-unit.source: Your Session
trans-unit.note: Title that welcome the user after selecting Your Session mode in the menu

trans-unit.id: Your body has its own wisdom, knowing how to find balance between what feels light and what feels intense.
trans-unit.source: Your body has its own wisdom, knowing how to find balance between what feels light and what feels intense.
Ombrace
trans-unit.note: Bundle name

trans-unit.source: Questa app utilizza la fotocamera per il tracciamento delle mani.
trans-unit.target: Questa app utilizza la fotocamera per il tracciamento delle mani.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Camera Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Utilizzato per il riconoscimento delle mani con Vision
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato per il riconoscimento delle mani con Vision
